resources.string: "Health is not a one-size-fits-all commodity. For self care to be effective, it has to account for your particular health problems and be easy for you to understand and follow. Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care Systems do just that. They help with key aspects of health … weight control, anxiety, fatigue, high cholesterol, insomnia and more. Each Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care System includes specific recommendations for diet, lifestyle and related herbal formulas. It's a natural step-by-step process that helps restore balance and create health. "

"Health is not a one-size-fits-all commodity. For self care to be effective, it has to account for your particular health problems and be easy for you to understand and follow. Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care Systems do just that. They help with key aspects of health … weight control, anxiety, fatigue, high cholesterol, insomnia and more. Each Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care System includes specific recommendations for diet, lifestyle and related herbal formulas. It's a natural step-by-step process that helps restore balance and create health. "

"Health is not a one-size-fits-all commodity. For self care to be effective, it has to account for your particular health problems and be easy for you to understand and follow. Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care Systems do just that. They help with key aspects of health … weight control, anxiety, fatigue, high cholesterol, insomnia and more. Each Maharishi Ayurveda Self-Care System includes specific recommendations for diet, lifestyle and related herbal formulas. It's a natural step-by-step process that helps restore balance and create health. "

"Each of our formulas is a precise combination of herbs that are carefully selected and combined to strengthen the formula in seven crucial ways: \n* Main herbs for the primary benefit * Herbs to increase absorption * Herbs to remove toxins * Herbs to enhance digestion and prevent internal toxins * Herbs to balance and support other herbs * Herbs to block the effects of stress * Herbs to nourish every cell * Potent from the Start"
"Balance Vata when you are changeable, indecisive, fast moving or anxious, and prone to insomnia, dry skin and constipation."

"1. Favor foods that are sweet, salty and sour. 2. Establish a regular daily routine. 3. Go to bed early. 4. Keep warm, especially when the weather is cold and windy. 5. The Organic Calming Spice Mix (ayurvedic seasoning), Organic Vata Tea and Vata Aroma blend will help."
"Balance Pitta when you are intense, critical, frustrated or angry, and prone to overwork, a ravenous appetite, and sensitive skin."

" 1. Favor foods that are sweet, bitter and astringent. 2. Make time for leisure. 3. Don't skip meals. 4. Stay cool, especially when the weather is hot. 5. Add Organic Cooling Spice Mix to your dishes, drink Organic Pitta Tea and use the Pitta Aroma blend."
"Balance Kapha when you are lethargic, complacent or slow moving, and prone to easy weight gain, congestion, oily skin and oversleeping."

" 1. Favor foods that are pungent, bitter and astringent. 2. Seek variety and new things in life. 3. Don't overeat, and exercise regularly. 4. Stay warm, especially when the weather is cold and damp."
"How accurately do the following statements describe you? "
"I find it difficult to make decisions."
"I can quickly pick up something new."
"I find it hard to learn something by heart and retain it."
"I have difficulty falling asleep and wake up often in the night."
"I often have dry skin, and cold hands and feet."
"I have a light build and do not gain weight easily."
